description:
When live migration of virtual machines is executed using "nova-manage vm live_migration [instance-id] [destination]" command, the VM is always suspended before migration.
(I found that vm_stop function of KVM is called.)
This is not live migration.
title: nova-manage supports migration, instead of live migration

comments.content:
When live migration of virtual machines "nova-manage vm live_migration [instance-id] [destination]" command, the VM is always suspended before migration.
(I found that vm_stop function of KVM is called.)
This is not live migration.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jihun735

comments.content:
I fixed this bug by adding VIR_MIGRATE_LIVE flag in the nova/virt/libvirt/connection.py file
https://code.launchpad.net/~jihun735/+junk/nova-live-migration
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jihun735

comments.content: What needs to be done here to fix this bug?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
